headline: 'A $2M Bet On Recovery': Bill Gates Quietly Buys 2 Stocks He Believes Will Define 2025's Economic Boom
summary: Bill Gates is turning heads again, but not for anything tech-related. While Microsoft (NASDAQ:MSFT) remains his largest holding (about $15.4 billion) in the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation portfolio, Gates has been making some surprising moves. Over the past year, he sold nearly a quarter of his Microsoft stock, but his bold third-quarter buys have everyone talking.
